text_block_list.text: One day, after winning many races with Sakura Bakushin O.
When I was in the trainer's office, I found the "Hot Spring Trip Ticket" that we won in the lucky draw. Speaking of which――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: When the world becomes so exemplary that it is no longer in need of a class president, let's go to a hot spring.
…I don't really understand the language she was speaking, but since the expiration date was near, for now I decided to go give it to Sakura Bakushin O.
However――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――I see… The time has finally come upon us!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It sure feels like an exemplary world these days! What can I say, all is quite peaceful～.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: For example, in class, from beginning to the end, I find it going by in complete silence!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Well, then! I'm going to Bakushin straight for the hot springs straightaway!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Ooooh～～～～! Isn't this just a splendid hot spring inn!!
With the very spirit of Bakushin, I found myself standing in front of an inn with nothing but the clothes I was wearing…!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: This is a traditional Ryokan! Very exemplary! It's got a bit of a class president feel to it, don't you think?～

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Alright then, Trainer, let's get into those hot springs without any further delay!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Proper etiquette is to take a hot bath to warm yourself up and clean yourself off before hopping in!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Diligently follow any and all rules! That's the key to having fun!
In the hot springs…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Hawaaa～～… That was quite the nice hot spring～…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Somehow, I feel like I'm glowing! How do I look, don't I look more polished than before!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Doesn't it―! Just as expected, the hot spring seems to have the effect of making your skin glow.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: If my skin is so sleek, surely I must be speeding up!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I must test the validity of this…. Hmmhm, hot springs, speaking of hot spring's speed――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Table tennis is the only way! Trainer, it's time for a match!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's OK! You can sweat it out as many times as you please!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Lets get lots of exercise and soak in plenty of that hot springs water!
True to her word, she made great use of the inn's facilities, and I had a lot of fun with Sakura Bakushin O. And after that――

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Fuhhaah～～～……All the same, no matter how invincible of a class president I am, I'm totally and completely tired out…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: It's been a long time since I've played this much to my heart's content after I decided to become class president…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Because when it comes to travel-related events, that's exactly where the class president comes in!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: On top of that, as everyday class president, I'm always on the lookout while doing my rounds…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: But today, I was able to properly stretch my wings.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Nonetheless, it's kind of like a solar eclipse now that the class president's help is no longer desperately needed.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: The time when the sun―or the class president, in this metaphor―is hiding is very short.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Another class president will soon be needed. For that, we must remain exemplary!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I'll return from the hot spring, with sleek and gleamy skin, and show you all a new, powered-up version of the class president!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Yessir!!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: …But, um.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I also think that understanding the feelings of classmates who make a fuss is the only way to guide them in the proper direction…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: I think that perhaps, hanging out with Trainer more is exemplary behavior here.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Y, you think so, too….right?
choice_data_list: Yeah, we've still got more games to play!
Yeah, we've still got more games to play!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: ――Roger that.♪
After that, I enjoyed a lot of time at the inn with a Sakura Bakushin O who was in quite the gleeful mood.
It was a time when I felt an irreplaceable bond with Sakura Bakushin O…
